A story about a unicorn who doesn't have a horn but possesses unique powers and abilities that make it stand out.
A mythological creature with a single horn that is not made of any physical material but rather has magical properties.
A unicorn with a unique appearance, such as a white coat with black stripes or a horn that is not a single point but rather a spiral shape.
A unicorn that has lost its horn and must embark on a journey to find it again, along the way learning valuable lessons about perseverance and self-acceptance.
A unicorn that doesn't have a horn but has a powerful magic spell that it uses to protect and serve others.
